item.title: Photographer/Videographer Needed for Conference Coverage - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced photographer/videographer to capture high-quality images and videos during our upcoming conference. This event will take place October 15-17, 2024, in Rosemont, IL. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, the ability to capture dynamic moments, and experience working in a fast-paced environment.
*Capture professional photos and videos throughout the conference, including keynote speeches, breakout sessions, networking events, and candid moments.
*Provide on-site photo and video coverage for 2.5 days.
*Edit and deliver a selection of high-resolution photos and fully edited videos post-event.
*Collaborate with our team to understand specific shots and angles needed.
*Ensure all equipment is set up and functioning properly.

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 26, 2024 21:10 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, People, Videography, Photography, Event Photography, Video Editing
Skills: Business, People, Videography, Photography, Event Photography, Video Editing

item.title: Video Editor for Fashion Reels - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create shorts everyday for our brands. Basically Fcebook ads. (videos take max 20 min to make)

We will give raw footage and you do your magic

Some examples:
https://business.facebook.com/vivielleboutique/posts/pfbid0WoJUfc2ap9DetKheDM8Qg7kWd5TXX7qzAhgqLkkWUKk8bDqKXsDGSAKjw371e5Fjl

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8rDfVwMjgG/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8pOAVnMXQc/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

The hard part is not the editing as you see. Of course you need to have skills but the most important part is to make the video captivating.

You need to do researches on which fonts to use best for fashion niches, which music is now trending and "girly". You need to go on tiktok/instagram and search for fashion brands by yourself for inspiration.

Add captions with emojis and stuff, as the first video linked above

This is a BAD example: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1930vZgOueh7hVERuXHFuE6UOwGNBjCAM/view?usp=drive_link

We need the music to have ups and downs, beats , example see beat at 13s and notice how the music began low (trendy music btw):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Qf3TRHrds17nv6dCkiKFge1mtQ8k9kb7/view?usp=drive_link

If you're ready to pop up 1 video with some variations a day (Monday to friday) and be paid 100$/month, it would be awesome and glad to have you

Send please your porfolio. Write "fashion" at the beginning so I know you read all


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 21:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: TikTok/Reels/Video Brand Model/Narrator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a dynamic and engaging individual to be an additional face and voice of our TikTok and Reels social media content. As a TikTok Brand Model/Narrator, you will play a role in delivering news and messages to our growing social media audience.

Responsibilities:
-Feature in TikTok and Reels social media posts, showcasing your voice and face.
-Record multiple messages per week using a green screen setup.
-Follow provided scripts and use supplied images to create content.
-Collaborate with our social media team to ensure consistent and on-brand messaging.

Requirements:
-Strong on-camera presence with the ability to engage and captivate an audience.
-Clear and articulate voice for effective narration.
-Experience with green screen recording is a plus.
-Ability to meet deadlines and manage time effectively.
-Passion for social media and staying updated on trends.

Join us in creating compelling content and connecting with our audience through the power of social media!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 20:57 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Announcer Tone, Calming Tone, Cute Tone, Corporate Tone, Video Narration, Video Production
Skills: Announcer Tone, Calming Tone, Cute Tone, Corporate Tone, Video Narration, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Creative promo video for Avant-Garde Jewelryfor social media - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative graphic designer to help us create eye-catching promotional ads for our avant-garde jewelry sales on Shopify and other social media platforms. As a graphic designer, you will be responsible for designing visually stunning and compelling advertisements that effectively communicate our brand's unique aesthetic and appeal to our target audience.

Key Skills:
- Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign
- Strong understanding of typography, color theory, and layout design principles
- Ability to create engaging visuals that align with brand guidelines
- Experience in creating promotional ads for e-commerce platforms and social media

If you are passionate about avant-garde jewelry and have a keen eye for design, we would love to work with you!

Please include your portfolio showcasing your previous graphic design work with your application.

We look forward to hearing from you soon!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$17.00

item.title: Media Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video / image editor to assist with matching and overlaying social media content.

Project Overview:
During a mass download from social media, the original files were separated from their overlay stickers (Snapchat/Instagram). Your task is to match the original content with the corresponding overlay stickers, then superimpose the overlays onto the original files using Adobe Premiere, and export the final edited content.

Responsibilities:
- Match the original media files with their corresponding overlay stickers.
- Use Adobe Premiere to superimpose the overlays onto the original content.
- Export the edited files.
- Deliver the final edited content back to us.

Requirements:
- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere.
- Attention to detail to ensure accurate matching and overlaying.
- Ability to deliver high-quality edited content promptly.

Deliverables:
- Edited media content with overlays accurately superimposed and exported.


Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 20:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Data Entry
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Data Entry
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a talented video editor who can assist me with creating engaging short-form content from my existing YouTube videos. The ideal candidate will be able to:

• Review my YouTube videos and identify informational and impactful clips.
• Edit these clips using CapCut, following a simple and pre-established format.
• Post three times per day on both TikTok and Instagram.

Responsibilities:

• Watch and understand the content of my YouTube videos.
• Clip out the most valuable and engaging informational pieces.
• Edit these clips in CapCut to fit the style and format I have already established.
• Schedule and post three times per day on both TikTok and Instagram.

Requirements:

• Experience with video editing, particularly using CapCut.
• Familiarity with TikTok and Instagram posting and content trends.
• Attention to detail to ensure clips are engaging and informative.
• Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
• Strong communication skills to ensure alignment with content goals.

To Apply:

Please provide examples of your previous work, especially any short-form content created for TikTok or Instagram. Mention your experience with CapCut and any relevant skills that make you a great fit for this role.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 20:42 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for 4K video footage - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor for a couple of jobs:

1. Video Podcast

This podcast has already had several episodes recorded and edited in a particular style, so we have the Premier Pro files for you to use for ease.
We record with 3 cameras - one on each guest and then a wide angle, and we have professional microphones to capture each speaker, as well as the microphone audio feeding in the main wide lens camera.

Each episode is 40-60mins long.

Here are the requirements for each episode:
- Combine all the files and cut out all the unnecessary parts
- Make natural cuts throughout the video so that it makes for nice viewing
- Colour grade so it matches our previous episodes
- Clean out the audio so it's also studio quality like our previous episodes
- Create the trailer and pop it at the beginning of the video as well as exporting as a separate file

We'd also love the ideal person to create additional clips for us and even upload and manage our YouTube. But we can quote for that separately.

We release an episode every single week and so we'd really like someone to give us a fixed price per episode or even a bulk rate for 5, 10 or 20 episodes.

2. YouTube video editing

We will be releasing a minimum of 3 videos per week on YouTube and we are looking for someone who is very quick with this due to the high volume.

This won't be complicated as we will have just one camera and the videos will be between 5-15 mins long.

However, these will require more B-roll to be added in, some graphics to be on the screen and generally we'd love someone who has experience in helping YouTubers grow their channel so they can help manage this too.

IDEAL CANDIDATE
The ideal candidate is someone who is proficient in Premiere Pro and other new AI editing tools so that we can speed up the process and create some cool stuff.
They are also passionate about video and have experience with YouTube and want to take more responsibility to manage things.

They'd bring creative ideas to the table and be very much part of the team.

We are looking for a long-term commitment and someone who can actually dedicate several hours a week, rather than miss deadlines and disrupt our workflow.

So, please only apply if you have time to dedicate per week.

Would love to get a quote for the podcast episode editing and the 3x videos per week for the YouTube channel.

Skills:Color Grading, Footage-Based Video, Spokesperson Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Videography

item.ns0:encoded:
I am looking for a video editor for a couple of jobs:

1. Video Podcast

This podcast has already had several episodes recorded and edited in a particular style, so we have the Premier Pro files for you to use for ease.
We record with 3 cameras - one on each guest and then a wide angle, and we have professional microphones to capture each speaker, as well as the microphone audio feeding in the main wide lens camera.

Each episode is 40-60mins long.

Here are the requirements for each episode:
- Combine all the files and cut out all the unnecessary parts
- Make natural cuts throughout the video so that it makes for nice viewing
- Colour grade so it matches our previous episodes
- Clean out the audio so it's also studio quality like our previous episodes
- Create the trailer and pop it at the beginning of the video as well as exporting as a separate file

We'd also love the ideal person to create additional clips for us and even upload and manage our YouTube. But we can quote for that separately.

We release an episode every single week and so we'd really like someone to give us a fixed price per episode or even a bulk rate for 5, 10 or 20 episodes.

2. YouTube video editing

We will be releasing a minimum of 3 videos per week on YouTube and we are looking for someone who is very quick with this due to the high volume.

This won't be complicated as we will have just one camera and the videos will be between 5-15 mins long.

However, these will require more B-roll to be added in, some graphics to be on the screen and generally we'd love someone who has experience in helping YouTubers grow their channel so they can help manage this too.

IDEAL CANDIDATE
The ideal candidate is someone who is proficient in Premiere Pro and other new AI editing tools so that we can speed up the process and create some cool stuff.
They are also passionate about video and have experience with YouTube and want to take more responsibility to manage things.

They'd bring creative ideas to the table and be very much part of the team.

We are looking for a long-term commitment and someone who can actually dedicate several hours a week, rather than miss deadlines and disrupt our workflow.

So, please only apply if you have time to dedicate per week.

Would love to get a quote for the podcast episode editing and the 3x videos per week for the YouTube channel.


Posted On: June 26, 2024 20:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Footage-Based Video, Spokesperson Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Videography
Skills: Color Grading, Footage-Based Video, Spokesperson Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Videography

item.title: Omni-Platform Social Media Manager for Founder/CEO Personal Brand - Upwork
item.description:
I am the founder of a recruitment company, and I am seeking a skilled and experienced Social Media Manager to handle my personal brand across various platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and X (formerly Twitter).

Examples of Desired Profiles:
Phil Sitter
Alex Hormozi
Codie Sanchez
Roberto Nickson

Responsibilities:
• Develop and execute a comprehensive content strategy to enhance my personal brand
• Schedule and post content consistently across all platforms
• Create engaging content that drives high engagement and follower growth
• Understand and leverage social media algorithms to maximize reach and impact
• Edit videos for various social media formats and platforms
• Engage with the community by commenting, liking, and following relevant accounts
Requirements:
• Proven experience in managing social media profiles for founders/CEOs or similar high-profile personal brands
• Strong knowledge of what types of content perform well on different social media platforms
• Expertise in social media algorithms and how to use them to the brand's advantage
• Proficient in video editing and creating visually appealing content
• Excellent communication and engagement skills

This is a long-term position with significant room for growth. As my social media manager, you will play a crucial role in shaping and amplifying my personal brand. I am looking for someone who is passionate, creative, and ready to take on this exciting challenge.


Posted On: June 26, 2024 20:19 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Content Management, Content Creation, Marketing Analytics, Reputation Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Marketing Strategy, Facebook, Instagram, Content Writing
Skills: Content Management, Content Creation, Marketing Analytics, Reputation Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Marketing Strategy, Facebook, Instagram, Content Writing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Fashion Brand - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create shorts everyday for our brands. Basically Fcebook ads. (videos take max 20 min to make)

We will give raw footage and you do your magic

Some examples:
https://business.facebook.com/vivielleboutique/posts/pfbid0WoJUfc2ap9DetKheDM8Qg7kWd5TXX7qzAhgqLkkWUKk8bDqKXsDGSAKjw371e5Fjl

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8rDfVwMjgG/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8pOAVnMXQc/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

The hard part is not the editing as you see. Of course you need to have skills but the most important part is to make the video captivating.

You need to do researches on which fonts to use best for fashion niches, which music is now trending and "girly". You need to go on tiktok/instagram and search for fashion brands by yourself for inspiration.

Add captions with emojis and stuff, as the first video linked above

This is a BAD example: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1930vZgOueh7hVERuXHFuE6UOwGNBjCAM/view?usp=drive_link

We need the music to have ups and downs, beats , example see beat at 13s and notice how the music began low (trendy music btw):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Qf3TRHrds17nv6dCkiKFge1mtQ8k9kb7/view?usp=drive_link

If you're ready to pop up 1 video with some variations a day (Monday to friday) and be paid 100$/month, it would be awesome and glad to have you

Send please your porfolio. Write "fashion" at the beginning so I know you read all


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 20:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: France
click to apply
